thread.title: AMBER
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by AMBER

author: AMBER
title: AMBER
text: I turned up to the check in counter and was embarrassed to learn my licence had expired. Neam went out of her way to help me renew it (which took me over 1.5hrs with the Renewals dept of my state). She was consistently pleasant, and helped me wrangle my two kids (age three and under) and luggage to the car once the issue was resolved. She is an excellent employee and representative of redspot.
